tab1.text1:
Thank you for joining this server! You can join our discord by clicking the Discord button below!



SETTINGS:


- Harvest: x25

- Taming: x100

- Tribe Limit: 6 man

- Collision: Enabled

- Custom Craft

- Bushberry System for Bosses

- Active Staffs

tab2.text1:
❌ - Do not build on  KO/Bed and similar ratholes

❌ - Building to restrict usage of drops or resource areas is NOT allowed

❌ - Meshing, Exploiting, Tunneling, Duping is NOT allowed

❌ - OB Building is NNOT allowed (Blue Ob Allowed)

❌ - Caging is allowed only 3H
